name: Memory Bank Session Recording
description: Manual session recording with AppleScript automation and privacy controls
long_description: Memory Bank DXT provides manual session recording with AppleScript automation for Claude Desktop. Features include 'save this' commands, exchange replay, off-the-record mode for privacy, and comprehensive conversation preservation. Built with defensive programming principles.

tools.name: start_session
tools.description: Initialize session recording for a project with opt-out capability

tools.name: save_this
tools.description: Manually save the current exchange to memory bank

tools.name: replay
tools.description: Show the last recorded exchange from memory bank

tools.name: session_status
tools.description: Check current recording status and session information
